mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT f.id as id, f.create_time as createTime, f.icon as icon, f.name as name, f.pid as pid, f.menu_type_id as menuTypeId, f.url as url, f.seq as seq, f.remark as remark, f.tab_type as tabType, f.stat as stat FROM t_admin_menu f WHERE f.stat = 1 AND f.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.menu_id FROM t_admin_role_menu c WHERE c.stat = 1 AND c.role_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT a.role_id FROM t_admin_users_role a WHERE a.user_id = ( SELECT id FROM t_admin_users WHERE id = #{userId} AND stat = 1 ) AND a.stat = 1 ) )

SELECT DISTINCT menu.id as id, menu.create_time as createTime, menu.icon as icon, menu.name as name, menu.pid as pid, menu.menu_type_id as menuTypeId, menu.url as url, menu.seq as seq, menu.remark as remark, menu.tab_type as tabType, menu.stat as stat FROM t_admin_menu menu where menu.stat=1 and menu.id=#{menuId} ORDER BY menu.seq asc
